title: Visual Mnemonic Workshop for Understanding Australian Tax Law

context.prior_knowledge: Basic accounting principles and tax terminology understanding
context.additional_context: Condensed course on core Australian tax law concepts for mid-level professionals. Interactive learning environment utilizing digital tools.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately reproduce the three core taxation principles of Australian tax law (income tax, GST, corporate tax) using pictorial mnemonics with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can convert complex tax provisions into visual diagrams and explain them to peers within 5 minutes.
Learners achieve over 70% accuracy by applying learned mnemonic techniques to real-world tax case analyses.

resources: Summary of key Australian tax law provisions (PDF)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
